timeline.message: Refactor: Refactoring the Notification processing in preparation for using the new cache client.
Feat(Cache): Updating to blackduck-common 51.0.0, using the new cache client in the stateful provider so that it is used in the notification processing.

timeline.bodyText: Will we always want to use the cache client? If so, we should add a TODO for the second method here or deprecate it.
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: No I don't think it makes sense to always use the cache client. We want to use it in the notification processing because we know there is a large of amount of duplicate requests but in the rest of the code it is likely to only add a memory cost with little to no benefit.
replies.author: jamesrichard91

timeline.message: Refactor: Updating the logging to use the new errorAndDebug() method.
